title: The Teaching Ambassadors: International Teaching Fellowships
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Ivan Gaal and Victoria. Ministry of Education

video_links.name: The Teaching Ambassadors: International Teaching Fellowships

brief_description: Looks at the International Fellowship Scheme which operates in Victoria. Highlights the professional development aspects of the project, the influence visiting participants have on school communities and the input gained by schools upon the return of Victorian recipients. Featured speakers include: Rex Murfett, Susan Gianevsky, Richard Wood, Alex McKnight and Kevin Collins.
